text:
Action1 has PowerShell scripts available as well: 
“Fixing WinRE Update Issues for CVE-2024-20666 and KB5034441” 
https://www.action1.com/fixing-winre-update-issues-for-cve-2024-20666-and-kb5034441/

metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] You may hit a 0x80070643 - ERROR_INSTALL_FAILURE
metadata.email_text_original:
You don't often get email from mjudd@360smartnet.com. Learn why this is
important [https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification] 
Action1 has PowerShell scripts available as well: 
“Fixing WinRE Update Issues for CVE-2024-20666 and KB5034441” 
https://www.action1.com/fixing-winre-update-issues-for-cve-2024-20666-and-kb5034441/

Sent: Thursday, January 11, 2024 1:36 PM
To: patchmanagement@googlegroups.com
Subject: Re: [patchmanagement] You may hit a 0x80070643 - ERROR_INSTALL_FAILURE
